description.raw:
This is a backport of pull request #542, which accompanied [homebrew-simulation pull request 666](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/666), which added an `ignition-tools` dependency to sdformat7. This pull request accompanies [homebrew-simulation PR 810](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/810) which adds that dependency to sdformat6.

The `sdf6` branch is unstable when built against that homebrew-simulation pull request with one of the ign tests failing:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=599)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/sdformat/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/599/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/sdformat/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/599/

This branch fixes that test:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=600)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/sdformat/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/600/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/sdformat/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/600/
description.html:
This is a backport of pull request #542, which accompanied homebrew-simulation pull request 666, which added an ignition-tools dependency to sdformat7. This pull request accompanies homebrew-simulation PR 810 which adds that dependency to sdformat6.

The sdf6 branch is unstable when built against that homebrew-simulation pull request with one of the ign tests failing:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/sdformat/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/599/

This branch fixes that test:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/sdformat/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/600/

The sdf6 branch is unstable when built against that homebrew-simulation pull request with one of the ign tests failing:
